name: AppDiscover
tag_list: ipad, iphone, ipod-touch, ipad-apps, iphone-apps, ipod-touch-apps, applications, ipad-applications, iphone-applications, ipod-touch-applications, best-apps, top-apps, favorite-apps, cool-apps, mobile, mobile-apps, mobile-applications
overview:
AppDiscover is a website and mobile application that helps mobile users find, rate, and share the best apps for their iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch.

AppDiscover’s website (www.appdiscover.com) has easy-to-use search and browse features to give users immediate and highly relevant app recommendations based upon what they need and want. Users can narrow their choices by category, price, and rating, view the details of each app (including reviews, screenshots, and videos), and share their favorite applications with their friends on social networks like Facebook and Twitter. Users are also able to read weekly and daily featured app reviews on topics ranging from games to entertainment to news written by AppDiscover’s professional reviewers.

AppDiscover packs all these features into its mobile app for consumers on the go. In addition, the iPhone and iPod Touch app includes a real-time stream of users’ searches and an app-roulette feature where you can throw caution to the wind and get a random recommendation.

AppDiscover is a one-stop shop for mobile appsâ€”discovery, search/browse, ratings, reviews, and sharing.
